participants.name: Aaron Hail, CFP®, RICP®
participants.title: I help career professionals accelerate their financial independence.

messages.message:
Hi Brian, 

I see we are connected with some of the same people.

It looks like you do some great things here in the Phoenix area, so I was compelled to reach out and connect here on LinkedIn. I’d love to have you as part of my network. 

Aaron
